column4: Hi, i just very "very" recently installed ubuntu. Can anyone tell me how i should preform an app serch by keywords as i would in gentoo with the command emerge (for instance:$ emerge -s xmms); and if the listing in ubuntu carry along description of the programms contents. Thank you in advance.
apt-cache search appname --holycow was the first to respond
thank you also, and i noticed the first reply :P
